I provide my consent for the same and kindly request you to grant permission to my ward.

Thanking you
Father of Akash Priyadarshan Sahoo

Respected Sir.
I, Akash Priyadarshan Sahoo(UCSE20011), would request you to kindly grant me permission to leave the residence from February 3rd-5th for vistiing my home town. I hereby confirm that I will not be missing any classes during my absence.
Date of leaving- 3rd February
Time of leaving- 4 pm 
Date of arriving- 5th February 
Time of arriving- 10 am
Thank you. Yours sincerely
